"I'm a huge idiot...\| I fell for my best friend.\.
Instead of just keeping it inside I told him how I
feel.\. I'm afraid that I made things weird.
I feel like my heart is in a billion tiny little
pieces, but...\| For some reason he still wants to be
I cried every night for a week... I even cried in
front of him once.\| I feel like he's going to blame
himself but it's not his fault.
There are so many things I want to do with him.\| I
want to hold his hand.\. To look up at the stars
together. \|I want to kiss his big stupid face.
I may never get to do any of those things and it makes
me feel kind of hopeless at times. It almost felt like
my link to the world was starting to break...
But I will learn to be thankful for what we share.
It's bigger than my stupid feelings...\|
And who knows, maybe someday he will change his mind.
Either way,\. I love that boy with all of my heart."
